flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to walk 63000 steps in a week because 7 x 9000 = <<7*9000=63000>>63000
He has 18120 steps to walk on Friday and Saturday because 63000 - 9400 - 9100 - 8300 - 9200 - 8900 = <<63000-9400-9100-8300-9200-8900=18120>>18120
He needs to walk an average of 9060 on Friday and Saturday because 18120 / 2 = <<18120/2=9060>>9060
#### 9060

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18100, not 18120. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
